Injector/ Double Punch/ Manterror/ Nemesis Enforcer:

::Nemesis Enforcer moved, but stopped and re-aimed his weapon at Wolfgang's 
head as Dracona volunteered::

===========================================================

::Injector stood, looking at the cieling::
"No more autoguns so far." (he said reffering to the totaled cieling, 
motioning to Manterror to follow him down a corridor)

::Manteror followed::
"I hope there are more Maximals to kill on the way." (Manterror accessed his 
memory logs)
"When I learned about the Ark, I learned the layout.  But that was a while 
ago.  I believe the bridge (control room) is to the left." (they went to the 
left)

-------

::Double Punch de-cloaked in front of Hell Beast::
"He got away!  What are your orders?"

(I have a question, isn't Hell Beast inside the Ark, and if so how did Crow 
Lord roll into a field?)
